column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We gave Jinya another try and had a much better experience. It probably helped given the fact that when we went
column2: there was not a lot of people there. We were seated promptly and had a friendly waitress. Our food came out decently quick and as always
column3: the ramen was great. We had the tonkotsu black. The broth was very good. This time
column4: we did not have to wait forever to get our checks. Everything went quickly and smoothly. I'll most likely return again.
